name: 100 KILLS CHALLENGE
description:
100 Kills Challenge is a fast-paced first person shooter, combining the bloody reality of modern combat with a return to basics: Kill one hundred enemies before anyone else. How you do it is up to you: Be brutal, be clever, fight on your own or as part of a team, just be the first to reach one hundred kills.



Pick from meticulously rendered costumes of special forces operators, police response teams, criminal gangs, and terrorist groups, then fight across a dozen maps representing real world hot spots. Spill blood across the world, from downtown construction zones mired in gang warfare, through militia compounds in the boonies, to the iconic Duga-2 radar near Chernobyl.



Fight using meticulously replicated real-world firearms, from submachine guns, through semi- and automatic rifles, to DMRs and light machine guns. Use the map to lay traps or give a wake-up call to a camping sniper with a well placed grenade. Then rain down hellfire using drones, bombers, and gunships, racing for the ultimate goal.



Remember the rules: There are none. All that matters is reaching one hundred kills: Fighting as a lone wolf in 12 player deathmatch, as part of Blue or Red teams in team deathmatch, or facing a computer-controlled onslaught in our brutal PVE modes. And remember: The amount of ways to kill will increase, as the game is being constantly expanded and developed!

May the best player win!
